verses.text: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go \add into\add* the house of the \sc Lord\sc*.
Our feet shall stand Within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
Jerusalem \add is\add* builded As a city that is compact together:
Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the \sc Lord\sc*, \add Unto\add* the testimony of Israel, To give thanks unto the name of the \sc Lord\sc*.
For there are set thrones of judgment, The thrones of the house of David.
Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: They shall prosper that love thee.
Peace be within thy walls, \add And\add* prosperity within thy palaces.
For my brethren and companionsâ€™ sakes, I will now say, Peace \add be\add* within thee.
Because of the house of the \sc Lord\sc* our God I will seek thy good.
